com.gmail.davideblade99.healthbar.manager

Class PlayerBarManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.gmail.davideblade99.healthbar.manager.PlayerBarManager

  • public final class PlayerBarManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Class that handles the bars next to the names of the players
